result.eng: I pity the poor woman who died.

result.eng: I regret very much that I never saw the play.

result.eng: It is a pity that our generation never had a "JFK moment" like the one that came before us.
result.ga: is trua nach raibh jfk moment ag ár nglúin féin mar a bhí ag an gceann a tháinig romhainn

result.ponchtml: is trua naċ raiḃ jfk moment ag ár nglúin féin mar a ḃí ag an gceann a ṫáinig roṁainnIt is a pity that our generation never had a "JFK moment" like the one that came before us.

result.eng: It's a shame I didn't get an education when I was young.

result.eng: He felt sorry for Micheál Dubh and for what women did to him.
result.ga: bhí truaigh an tsaoil aige do mhicheál dubh agus don bhail a chuir an bhantracht air

result.eng: He felt sorry for them but there was nothing he could do for them.
